<meta property="og:description" content="There’s a much more complex and layered role for design in society, one whose importance has increased exponentially as digital and physical worlds merge." />

yoast_head_json.description: As humans, we’re wired to constantly adapt and learn, so as designers shape experiences and, interactions, consumption triggers and actions, we have the potential to fundamentally reshape the core of humanity.
yoast_head_json.og_title: What is the Responsibility of Design?
yoast_head_json.og_description: There’s a much more complex and layered role for design in society, one whose importance has increased exponentially as digital and physical worlds merge.
